formattedAddress: 260 Fort Washington Ave, New York, NY 10032, USA
adrFormatAddress: 260 Fort Washington Ave, New York, NY 10032, USA

originalText.text: Our experience in this daycare has been incredible! The teachers welcomed our baby with so much love and care: it was always easy to get in contact with them and all the necessary information about schedule and feeding were diligently logged. Whenever the weather allowed they spend time outside while when they stayed in the classroom they spent time singing, doing art and having fun. Our son always went to daycare with a smile. I can’t recommend this daycare and all the teachers enough! We will always be very grateful ❤️

originalText.text: I have nothing but praise for Brendy and her team at the Infant Nursery. Our son was 12 months when he started at the Infant Nursery and this was his first daycare experience. The bar was set really high for his future daycares. Brendy is so sweet and caring, and her team was so attentive to our child. He was happy to walk in every day, and at that age he was very stand-offish to anyone who wasn't his parents. The communication at the Infant Nursery is top tier. They log every time a child ate, used the bathroom, napped, several pictures through out the day, etc. I always felt like my son was safe and well taken care of. They payed attention to our son's likes and dislikes as well. I was always impressed.

originalText.text:
B&J Infant Nursery is a warm and welcoming environment for children and their families. My little one has been with them for 10 months and I can see the development in all areas. The staff are all so loving and treat her like she is their own. They take them on outings and come up with many different developmental and fun activities for the children throughout the year.

I also appreciate the access to the webcam for parents because when you are first leaving your little one it can be scary and that offered an extra sense of security. Overall, I could not recommend B&J more. They are the perfect place for those needing childcare in the Washinton Heights area.

originalText.text: Our first born attended the nursery just before the pandemic and during until she aged out. We were more than satisfied with the care she received during that time. When we had our second child we had no doubt the nursery would care for her as well. Brendy and the team eased all the first time parent nerves we felt and continue to assure we chose the right place. The team is super supportive of breastfeeding families and handle every drop with care. The updates on the app and access to video are also a huge plus. Thank you for the care and love you  have provided our children with.

originalText.text: We highly recommend you bring your baby to Ms. Brendy and all the teachers at the B & J Infant Nursery. Our son started going at 4 months and they were so patient as he learned to sleep in a new environment - now he naps better at daycare than he does with us on the weekends! The daily communication is incredible, with pictures and updates about naps, meals, diaper changes, and activities. Ms. Brendy also worked with us to ensure we felt comfortable through transitions from breast milk to starting solids and walking. It has been truly incredible to watch him thrive in this comfortable and celebratory environment, bringing home new sign language and words and crafts that he’s so proud of. We cannot recommend Ms Brendy and team enough!
